books.title: Flowers For Algernon
books.author: Daniel Keyes
books.synopsis: Charlie Gordon, IQ 68, is a floor sweeper and the gentle butt of everyone's jokes - until an experiment in the enhancement of human intelligence turns him into a genius.

books.title: Ubik
books.author: Philip K Dick
books.synopsis: A classic science fiction tale of artifical worlds by one of the great American writers of the 20th century.

books.title: The Sirens Of Titan
books.author: Kurt Vonnegut
books.synopsis: A deep and meaningful masterpiece of science fiction, full of heart and mind-bending ideas.

books.title: The Forever War
books.author: Joe Haldeman
books.synopsis: One of the very best science fiction novels of all time. An intelligent and thought provoking allegory for the Vietnam War.

books.title: The Kraken Wakes
books.author: John Wyndham
books.synopsis: It started with fireballs raining down from the sky and crashing into the oceans' deeps.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.synopsis: The Duke of Atreides has been manoeuvred by his arch-enemy, Baron Harkonnen, into administering the desert planet of Dune.

books.title: The Seeds of Time
books.author: John Wyndham
books.synopsis: One of the few authors whose compulsive readability is a compliment to the intelligence.

books.title: Trouble with Lichen
books.author: John Wyndham
books.synopsis: As each scientist wrestles with the implications and practicalities of exploiting the discovery, the world comes ever closer to learning the truth.
